verbs.description: Corey Lewandowski , the former Trump campaign manager , [V: has] been fired from his job as a political commentator for One America News Network .
Corey Lewandowski , the former Trump campaign manager , has [V: been] fired from his job as a political commentator for One America News Network .
[ARG1: Corey Lewandowski , the former Trump campaign manager ,] has been [V: fired] [ARG2: from his job as a political commentator for One America News Network] .
